MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele, affecting properties in St Georges Road, Ffordd Berth and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power via generator for those customers still without power. We now expect power to be restored by 2:30PM.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:48PM on 28th October 2020.
